# Overview

### What is scRNA-Seq?

**scRNA-Seq**, short for single-cell RNA sequencing, is the analysis of transcribed messenger RNA (mRNA) in single cells. Practically, scRNA-Seq involves the process of counting mRNA transcripts of many single cells, usually from one tissue.
